chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 is having the following problem:

The sound quality is disastrous, whether it's for calls or listening to music, the sound is 'robotic'.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a portable computer or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has completed all of the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not been damaged as a result of a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been erased.
✔ Has confirmed they have the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a portable computer or an electrical appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, within 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Hello ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder, as we noticed that you received a package for a return under warranty more than 3 business days ago (on 05/34/24). We remind you that the intervention time (return of a product or refund) is 3 business days in the case of a technical problem.

Please refund the product within the next 24 business hours, otherwise we will have to proceed with the refund in accordance with the Back Market charter.

Thank you in advance for your help,
Fafonie from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
